channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 政治动荡并未阻碍日本豪赌重回高科技鼎盛时期
item.description:
Political turmoil hasn’t prevented Japan from betting big on a return to its high-tech heyday https://t.co/oNgFOlU9Hx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 一场关于马来西亚最富有的家族之一如何创造财富的争斗在半个地球之外的瑞士法庭接近尾声。对于拥有超过 2 万亿美元全球财富的瑞士来说，这一判决可能是一个重要的决定。
item.description:
A fight over how one of Malaysia's richest families made its wealth is nearing its end half a world away in a Swiss court.

The verdict may be an important decision for Switzerland, home to more than $2 trillion of global fortunes https://t.co/nOrXtMNjlH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 认为您能比英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）做得更好吗？我们新推出的彭博预算游戏让您掌管英国的财政--您将削减哪些税收？您能让市场支持您吗？@joe_mayes 玩了这个游戏......结果并不尽如人意 ➡️
item.description:
Think you could do a better job than Chancellor Jeremy Hunt?

Our new Bloomberg Budget Game puts you in charge of the UK's money — which taxes will you cut? Can you keep markets onside? @joe_mayes plays the game... and it doesn't quite go to plan ➡️ https://t.co/l9ltTRxDnm pic.twitter.com/utRfPFXNmk

— Bloomberg UK (@BloombergUK) February 29, 2024

item.title: 尼日利亚的石油美元经济功能失调，甚至连美元都难以获得。出了什么问题？
item.description:
Nigeria's petrodollar economy is so dysfunctional that even dollars are hard to come by. What's gone wrong? https://t.co/cUzNcU5iIW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 日本首相岸田文雄在周四直播的一场史无前例的国会道德听证会上，就贿赂基金丑闻引发的公众不信任道歉，并承诺改革相关法规
item.description:
Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida apologizes in an unprecedented parliamentary ethics hearing broadcast live on Thursday for public distrust caused by a slush-fund scandal, pledging to reform regulations https://t.co/uNJw6ngYLn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 印度政府已批准对半导体制造厂进行价值 152 亿美元的投资，其中包括塔塔集团提出的建设该国首个大型芯片制造厂的建议。
item.description:
India’s government has approved $15.2 billion worth of investments in semiconductor fabrication plants, including a Tata Group proposal to build the country’s first major chipmaking facility https://t.co/iyskSsMZbt

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 普睿司曼的下任首席执行官表示，他将专注于增加股东回报，同时有选择性地寻求交易以产生协同效应
item.description:
Prysmian's next CEO said he’ll focus on increasing shareholder returns while selectively looking for deals to generate synergies https://t.co/WUvkksuFpK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 经济和政治动荡使一些中东国家难以加入世界贸易组织
item.description:
Economic and political turmoil makes it hard for some Middle Eastern countries to join the World Trade Organization https://t.co/0ydvhsN5Lu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 新消息：印度人在自己想要的东西上花的钱比在自己需要的东西上花的钱还多。这给许多跨国公司和本地快速消费品公司敲响了警钟，@menakadoshi 在印度版上写道（免费阅读）
item.description:
NEW: Indians are spending more on what they want than what they need.

It's a wake up call for many multinational and local FMCG companies, writes @menakadoshi in India Edition (Free to read) https://t.co/kdR7U5qvDi

— Bloomberg (@business) February 29, 2024

item.title: 日本最大的财产保险公司表示将出售交叉持股，因为政府向它们施压，要求它们放弃这种已有几十年历史的做法
item.description:
Japan’s largest property-and-casualty insurers say they will sell cross-shareholdings after the government pressured them to abandon the decades-old practice https://t.co/GFJ2RPNX0U

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 冰岛 2 月份消费物价涨幅超过该国两大贷款机构的预期
item.description:
Iceland’s consumer prices rose more than the country’s two biggest lenders had predicted in February https://t.co/cExek0VgKN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 非洲三分之一的国家将在今年选出新政府，希望借此减少冲突、刺激经济增长并促进非洲大陆的就业设置提醒#ThePoliticsSpace ⤵️
item.description:
A third of Africa’s nations will choose new governments this year, with the hopes of reducing conflict, spurring economic growth and boosting employment on the continent

Set a reminder for #ThePoliticsSpace ⤵️https://t.co/9p9kTLuUkZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 彭博新闻社/晨间咨询公司（Bloomberg News/Morning Consult）最新民调显示，在关键摇摆州，每10名选民中就有8人认为81岁的总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）太老了。将近十分之六的人认为拜登 11 月份可能的对手唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）是危险人物。
item.description:
Eight in 10 voters in key swing states said President Joe Biden, 81, is too old, a new Bloomberg News/Morning Consult poll found. Almost six in 10 described Donald Trump, his likely November opponent, as dangerous https://t.co/3p28H3IBNb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 彭博新闻社/晨间咨询公司的最新民调显示，费城的经济正在上扬，但该地区和宾夕法尼亚州各地的选民并不看好拜登
item.description:
The latest Bloomberg News/Morning Consult poll shows that Philadelphia's economy is on the upswing, but voters in the area and across Pennsylvania don't give Biden credit https://t.co/Sw3hacKde3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 土耳其将允许跨国公司将本地客户数据转移出境，企业称这将吸引数十亿美元的外国直接投资
item.description:
Turkey is to allow multinational firms to move local customer data out of the country, which businesses say could attract billions of dollars in foreign direct investment https://t.co/BRI15IEUbU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 英国 1 月份抵押贷款批准量升至 15 个月以来的新高，这进一步表明房地产市场正在积蓄动能
item.description:
UK mortgage approvals rose to a 15-month high in January, adding to signs that the housing market is gathering momentum https://t.co/iD2qhXIA2A

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 德国体育公司彪马将提高对投资者的赔付率，并回购价值 1 亿欧元的股票
item.description:
German sports company Puma will raise its payout to investors and buy back €100 million worth of shares https://t.co/0pgn54zm0L

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 印度债券被纳入摩根大通新兴市场债务指数后，预计将有数十亿美元流入印度，印度的大型贷款机构正与全球同行争夺其中的份额。
item.description:
Large Indian lenders are vying with their global peers for a share of the billions of dollars that are expected to flow following the inclusion of the nation’s bonds in JPMorgan’s emerging markets debt index https://t.co/9B1Kt4TFVW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 亿万富翁丹尼尔-克雷廷斯基（Daniel Kretinsky）正在权衡对法国 IT 公司阿托斯（Atos）部分股权的新收购要约。
item.description:
Billionaire Daniel Kretinsky is weighing a renewed takeover offer for parts of French IT firm Atos https://t.co/ymtB1IqeLC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 中国最高领导层承诺实现今年的经济目标，避免风险并保持社会稳定，这凸显了对受长期房地产危机和通货紧缩影响的经济复苏的担忧。
item.description:
China’s top leadership has pledged to meet economic targets for the year, avoid risks and maintain social stability, underscoring concern for a recovery hampered by a prolonged property crisis and deflation https://t.co/tKNrLsERww

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 一名英国对冲基金交易员承认在震惊丹麦的大规模税务丑闻中帮助丹麦骗取约 12 亿美元的指控
item.description:
A British hedge fund trader pleads guilty to allegations he helped swindle Denmark out of about $1.2 billion in a massive tax scandal that rocked the country https://t.co/yRU4vjsb0f

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 新的美国现货比特币交易所交易基金在不到两个月的时间里吸引了超过 70 亿美元的资金流入，正在撼动最古老的加密货币市场。
item.description:
New US spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds are shaking up the market for the oldest cryptocurrency after attracting more than $7 billion in inflows in less than two months https://t.co/teFtF1mbAb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 泰国计划在全国范围内部署 30 架飞机进行播云作业，诱发人工降雨，以消除空气污染，缓解主要农作物种植区的干燥天气状况。
item.description:
Thailand plans to deploy 30 aircraft nationwide for cloud-seeding operations to induce artificial rain to battle air pollution and ease dry weather conditions in the main crop-growing areas https://t.co/TKIiCY4v8B

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 东欧最大的贷款机构 Erste 表示，在经济产出放缓和房地产市场逆风的情况下，预计风险准备金将增加
item.description:
Erste, the largest lender in eastern Europe, says it expects risk provisions to rise amid a slowdown in economic output and property market headwinds https://t.co/5khAHCqYDB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国制裁措施的加强削弱了印度与俄罗斯的石油贸易，迫使加工商考虑其他供应方式
item.description:
Tightening enforcement of US sanctions is denting India’s oil trade with Russia, forcing processors to consider other supplies https://t.co/NsOu49f2FZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 德国 2 月份失业人数增加了 1.1 万人，是分析师预测的 5000 人的两倍多。
item.description:
Joblessness in Germany rose by 11,000 in February — more than double the 5,000 predicted by analyst https://t.co/nhbxxhGVGB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 津巴布韦通货膨胀率创六个月新高，市场正焦急地等待新的措施来重振岌岌可危的本币状况
item.description:
Zimbabwe’s inflation rate hits a six month high as the market anxiously waits for new measures to revamp the foundering local currency https://t.co/TpzT12ndgV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 随着全球对人工智能相关技术的需求激增，台湾预计今年经济将从 2023 年的低迷状态迅速反弹
item.description:
Taiwan projects its economy will rebound swiftly this year from a lackluster 2023 as surging global demand for artificial intelligence-related technologies fuels growth https://t.co/Uox7GKYozg

item.title: 周四是 PCE 日。以下是美联储最青睐的通胀指标的真正制作过程

item.title: 挪威王室表示，挪威国王哈拉尔五世将在马来西亚的一家医院再住几天，因为他的感染情况有所好转
item.description:
Norway’s King Harald V will remain at a Malaysian hospital for a few more days as his health improves from an infection, the Royal House of Norway says https://t.co/Irz0Ipgh4M
